items.content_html: This is a 3D book model created using Three.js, a lightweight 3D library for the web, and Vanilla JS, a pure JavaScript programming language without any additional frameworks or libraries. The book model is fully interactive and allows users to rotate and zoom in on the book.
items.title: sakibshadman19/book-threejs-vanillajs: This is a 3D book model created using Three.js, a lightweight 3D library for the web, and Vanilla JS, a pure JavaScript programming language without any additional frameworks or libraries. The book model is fully interactive and allows users to rotate and zoom in on the book.
